Test Name: HLA Class I (HLA-A, HLA-B, HLA-C) Disease Association Typing (Low Resolution)
Purpose: To perform low-resolution HLA-A, ‑B, and ‑C typing on blood samples for disease association studies, ensuring accurate and reproducible results.
Container: ACD (yellow top) or EDTA (purple top) tube
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermal cycler (PCR machine), sequence-specific oligonucleotide probes, electrophoresis system with gel documentation, DNA quantification system
